website_summaries.verdict: Larger families and heavy travelers alike will appreciate this highly rated 4-piece set.
pros: Many customers reported the bags' supreme durability after having used this luggage set for years
Comes in a variety of colors and sizes to meet your traveling needs
cons: Some customers had item arrive damaged from shipping

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend! This is our go-to set.
customer_reviews.text: We now own two of these sets and they've been great. My son is on an LDS Church mission, so he moves about every 6 weeks and these have withstood all of the moves for two years now! They held up so well for him that we just bought the same set for my daughter to take to college. The cases are well-built, good looking, and we will buy another set when we are ready to travel because now that our first two are out of the house, they've ended up taking all our luggage with them. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: S. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I love how my bags were packaged, shipped, and sent to me right on time! The suitcases were perfect! I love them so much! From the color all the way down to the size and storage space, the package was 100% legit. All the negative comments (if there are any) are probably unfortunate mishaps. Pros: •Color! •Everything! •Space! •Storage! •The depth of the suitcases are superb •There are wheels (but they do not spin) Cons: • The plastics on the items smell strong for a person with high smell sensitivity
customer_reviews.author: ZeZe19

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set in hopes of having it in time for a trip this weekend and received it the day before I needed it. At first glance, I saw that one of the teeth of the zipper of the largest case had a very minor misalignment issue. The zipper snagged a bit, but I decided to keep it, as that it wasn't that big of a deal. I inspected the case further and located a section of the rim about 2" to 2 1/2" long that had not been sewn together (see photo).
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased overall
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. I have been putting off replacing our 12 year old luggage because it's hard to buy and expensive. This was the perfect sizes for our family needs and is pretty good quality. For the price I am completely satisfied. I did take one star off because while it is good quality, its not superb. I noticed a few plastic pieces that aren't anchored very well and when the luggage is full the top handle seems like it might not last, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Travis & Marisa Tramp

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know yet
customer_reviews.text: So I have not traveled with them as of yet but will soon. At first glance they appear attractive and classy. But I am getting the feeling like this may turn into a get what you paid for scenario and perhaps they may end up falling apart or breaking somehow because they are very very light weight... normally when something’s significantly lighter than different company’s with the similar product, it’s cheaply made. These appear to be cheaply made. Having said that this is my first real luggage... so we will see. For now I judge on what I feel and see...
customer_reviews.author: chris elliott

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this luggage a couple of weeks ago for a trip to Dubai. One flight (check in baggage) and the suitcase is torn. If I had know that this was the quality, I would have taken cardboard boxes ! I feel cheated :(:( Look at the third photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price, as expected, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The luggage arrived in one big box with the luggage pieces one inside the other. There was slight bumps on the box but the luggage was completely undamaged. I have used this luggage on two trips now and have not had any problems. There are no tears or anything in the luggage. The wheels work perfectly, no squealing or anything. No issues with the pull handle either. I think as long as you have normal use, this product is great. If you are a regular traveler or know you are bit more rough with stuff you might want to go with something else. But I think this product is wonderful, especially for the price. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: NickyTop Contributor: Country Music

customer_reviews.title: Overall these were nice but the quality wasn't as expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall these were nice but the quality wasn't as expected. One of the wheel pairs broke shortly after purchase and after only used a few times. The luggage is very deep and holds more than enough but be careful with lining ripping easily. The handle got stuck and locked down on one piece to which I can't use that piece at all anymore. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joycelynne Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good luggage at good price.
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is good. The quality feels above average except for the handles that feel like they may break. The largest suitcase and the second largest are good for airline checked baggage. The smallest rolling bag is sized for overhead baggage. All the rolling bags fit inside each other so you can bring an empty suitcase as checked baggage very easily. The wheels feel solid. The interior is very plain with very few compartments and organizers but there is little wasted space. The locks included are useless but the product overall is priced very nicely even if you don't have to count the locks. Would buy again. Will update the review if any problems occur.
customer_reviews.author: James Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% - U.S. Traveler New Yorker 4-Piece Luggage Set
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this set for a longer trip than we usually take. The largest suitcase seems to be much sturdier in all aspects of construction, but the small rolling bag is cheap and not very reliable. The handle cracked off on one side the first use and not in a place that could be mended even as temporary. I am disappointed in that this was the size that would be used most often. It broke on the first roll out of the car to the airport. Will be attempting to contact manufacturer as well, since these products are supposed to be guaranteed for workmanship and quality under normal use for a short period.
customer_reviews.author: dinadina

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage for the price! Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: So I've personally never bought luggage before this, and was looking for something reasonably priced but still durable... So I took the chance ordering these and was surprised by the great quality when they arrived, we did put a waterproof spray over them so they would last longer! Pretty heavy duty and they are a nice size! Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: What happened
customer_reviews.text: We have been ordering US Traveler for years and unfortunately Delta completely ruined this brand new set of luggage. I didn't notice the extent of the damage until I got home so I was not able to file a claim. I bought a separate Amsterdam large suitcase and I'll be damned if Delta didn't total that one too - - a foot long tear in the back.
customer_reviews.author: 0210 loggie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive 4 pieces
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a trip I am going to take, but when they got here there were only 3 pieces. The small tote wasn't in the order, I emailed the address that was on the card that came with the set, but never heard anything from them. The large suite case is very large the other two look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The worst set of luggage I've ever owned! Two broken handles after one trip. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Ladina

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied...so far
customer_reviews.text: Used the luggage for the first time in June 2012 for a cruise to the Bahamas. The strap handle on the smallest wheeled bag broke before we ever got on the boat. When we got back home, I filed a warranty claim, they asked for pictures to the broken handle and soon after I received an email telling me another bag was on the way. I am very happy with the warranty but disappointed that the handle broke so easily. The bag expansions are a very nice feature and the material looks durable. I believe this is a very good set considering the low price.
customer_reviews.author: abrabble

customer_reviews.title: "Happ customer"
customer_reviews.text: Received my order early, love the set looks n feel durable. I searched high n low for this set on the internet, only Amazon lol lets do some traveling wit my new luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality bags
customer_reviews.text: The only issue with this is with years of use the handles can break off or too much weight. Great & my husband has been using them for seriously 5 years
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, love the red! The handbag is perfect for women's bathroom packing or as a carry on. And each case has pockets and a zipped mesh section inside. Also has strap downs if needed and a one inch extender. This is perfect if you're on a budget and need a good sturdy set. Each case comes with a lock but they are cheap and easily opened with a paperclip. If that's a concern for you I highly recommend buying more sturdy locks.
customer_reviews.author: raeanna

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: Took on international flight right after I bought it and the backing ripped open right over the metal bars. Doesn’t spin so it was hard to use and drag behind in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: torry

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in May for our trip from Ohio to Colorado. They handled the flight and trip up the mountain and back with flying colors. All pieces of the luggage set seem to be adequately built with good space. This set handled it's first trip of many with many more to come. They also have a good look as well. So if you are in the market for an inexpensive set of luggage that looks good, seems well built and won't break your bank. This would be a great set to consider. And you can't beat the price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: srings

customer_reviews.title: Good for your money
customer_reviews.text: Liked this set. the personal item bag's smaller strap did break before the end of our 2 week trip but other than that i have no other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mkramire

customer_reviews.title: Expensive looking set for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price. Look very modern. Well made. Zipper in bottom of suitcase in the lining for airport inspections. Easy transport. I should have got the red, but oh well, black blends with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Debi  Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Survived my trip!
customer_reviews.text: It survived my trip to Florida, not just a simple one stop trip either. These bags survived the airport baggage handlers (twice), the constant opening and closing as we lived out of them through our 4 stops, survived the packing and unpacking them from the car, survived being over stuffed at one point. We used the lil bag as a baby bag filled to its absolute maximum with baby survival gear, the next size up fit perfectly in the over head compartment from the plane. An amazing deal for such quality bags, not one regret
customer_reviews.author: JeremyL

customer_reviews.title: Six Months in and we are still happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I started traveling more, both for work and family trips. With two kids at home and one in college, we are on a budget so we tried this set. Six Months in and we are still happy with it, The pockets are roomy, and just when you think you have put in just a little too much clothing, there is another zipper that allows it to expand just a bit more. These pieces nest nicely, so storage is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C in East TX

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is great luggage especially for the price. It seems sturdy and well made. The pieces are a nice size and they are expandable. Most sets come with pieces that you would probably not use very much but I will be utilizing all these pieces. Price was great so if the airport tears it up I won't be as heartbroken as if it was an expensive set of luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set of luggage. We purchased this for our recent trip to Mexico and it was perfect. It stood up well and was the perfect fit for us.
customer_reviews.author: JW Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy Samsonite, as their products have been very reliable for me in the past, but the reviews were poor. So, I decided to buy US Traveler as the reviews were much better. I'm never sure whether to pay a lot of money for really good quality or buy cheap and throw away. I travel a lot and the airports seem to be able to destroy any luggage so I decided to buy cheap. This set is really good value for money and seems 'quite' well made. I've done one flight to the ME with two connections and the luggage arrived intact.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P M Saville

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just took her first trip with these. So far, so good. Appear to be well made. Perfect sizes.
customer_reviews.author: zEPoL

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous! Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I originally reviewed this after using one of the larger bags right after I received them. I didn't have a problem with that one but I just used the smaller bag for the first time and the handle broke on first use, cutting my hand pretty badly. There's a metal piece inside the connectors of the handles and it sliced my first finger when it broke, as I pulled it out of the trunk. Unfortunately it's past the return period so I'm stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: MChi

customer_reviews.title: Survived 2 trips to Mexico!
customer_reviews.text: Went on vacation twice and no rips noted! Stil in good condition. 😉 Got the black and gray ones and I'm pleased. If you are looking for something inexpensive for the family, these did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING I EVER BOUGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Value, Value, Value!! When I first purchased these my intentions were to use them for only one trip so that is why I didn't want to spend too much money. I have been using these for 2 years now on multiple trips!! I have bought very expensive luggage sets and honestly I have to say there are just as good. This is the best thing I ever bought for the money I spent. The material is very durable. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: midland134

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage
customer_reviews.text: Needed more luggage so I purchased this and there is enough for my boyfriend and I to both use.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY FELL APART, STUFF WAS FALLING OUT OF IT ON THE CAROUSEL UPON ARRIVAL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo upset about this luggage I ordered before I went on my trip. Two of the handles were broken off when it arrived, and two of the pieces zippers were broken. I had to get tape from the luggage desk to completely tape it up so that my stuff would not fall out. I WANT MY MONEY BACK FOR THIS CRAP LUGGAGE> DO NOT BUY THIS LUGGAGE.!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These look nice but the quality is terrible. The seams are already coming apart after ONE TRIP. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box, before I could even get it out, I noticed the plastic handle portion was broken where the bolts go into the luggage. If it can't make it to the front door undamaged, how can it make it through airports undamaged?? They're picking it up tomorrow and I'll never order this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a little over a month ago and it's already falling apart. The zipper on 2 of the bags have broken and no longer work. My clothes keep falling out and I haven't arrived at my destination yet. One of the handles has broken so I am not able to carry the bag which is difficult up stairs or to lift to put on the bed. I would not recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Yes it was cheap and had a lot of them, but they felt like they would break after 1 use. Also, one of them came broke. Returned. Full Refund.
customer_reviews.author: op_king

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Suitcases!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome suitcases! I'm very happy with this purchase and there is a size for every need. Very durable, zippers work well, and they all nest together for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: JAW

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND. DOES STAND THE TEST OF TIME.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this luggage about 15 times and the seams are already giving out. I do not recommend this product, plus there are smarter options out there that wheel through the airports much easier than these.
customer_reviews.author: HORSE LOVER

customer_reviews.title: Super thin - not protective or durable
customer_reviews.text: Fabric and frame were quite thin - I didn’t trust it to hold up to use and returned it
customer_reviews.author: D. Skau

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product isn’t great
customer_reviews.text: It’s very lightweight, however the maneuverability isn’t the best because it doesn’t have the swivel wheels. The durability is terrible. Although I bought them almost two years ago, they have only been used to travel 4 times and the handle has completely fallen apart!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality but its good for the price... thanks
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo I.

customer_reviews.title: great luggage.
customer_reviews.text: great luggage. love the handles, wheels, and lots of room inside.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Graduation Gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our grandson as a gift for entering into his new life of adulthood. The set is very nice looking and the whole set is sturdy not only in the zippers and materials, but also has a nicely made handles for pulling luggage around. Would order this again. A good price for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal for this luggage set. The price was extremely reasonable and each piece seems like it's high-quality. The suitcases are not very large but they are very deep and seem to hold quite a few items. I purchased this app on Amazon prime day and it appears to have been an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great price
customer_reviews.text: Used the large and middle one on a round trip nyc-mexico and they held up perfectly. They are light and the stuff pack well into them. Good inside and outside pockets. Used the second to smallest one for my son as a carry on and stuffed it to the max and it was great. Really cant go wrong with this price! good qaulity
customer_reviews.author: tanyaj

customer_reviews.title: The smell was very strong and I was impressed by the poor quality. I've now viewed several sets in this ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. The smell was very strong and I was impressed by the poor quality. I've now viewed several sets in this price range, and they are all fairly similar, though this one seemed on the low end. I was disapointed because the reviews seemed promising. I opted for individual pieces from revo instead--I got three pieces for twice the price of this four piece set, but was much happier with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the 4-Piece and got only 3 Pieces.  Where is the missing piece???
customer_reviews.text: Great price, good quality, but where is the 4th unit as advertised?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best luggage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase! Very classy look! I purchased the black color. It looks even better in person. I read lots of reviews for luggage and this was my choice. It will not disappoint you!
customer_reviews.author: amethyst d.

customer_reviews.title: it held up on two trips so far.
customer_reviews.text: they are decent quality they held up on my trip to Europe and weekend in sanfrancisco, though the zipper on the big one broke and the company says no refunds so whatever it still closes.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases are great. They're very sturdy standard suitcases. I love the look and fabric. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Walker.09

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is a good size and an overall nice collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money get the hardshell one
customer_reviews.text: It gets ripped off in the first trip I have to throw my way
customer_reviews.author: Armen abnoos

customer_reviews.title: Feels durable and not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend!! will update in the near future to confirm durability.. So far, there hasnt been any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Preet

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set is built very well. The different sizes provide an option for every trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother if you are taller than 5'3"
customer_reviews.text: The luggage itself is not too bad. I definitely wouldn't use for heavy airline travel, but the handle on the carry on size extends literally just high enough for me to make it work and I'm short! My six foot husband cannot use it. How's that for convenience?!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are great for foreign travel, they have not ripped and the zippers still work!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Veronica

customer_reviews.title: quality and price are excellent only thing that made this cheap was the little ...
customer_reviews.text: quality and price are excellent only thing that made this cheap was the little garbage locks that came with.... please do away with the cheap locks... 1 was so crappy i had to cut it off ... outside of those excellent purchase
customer_reviews.author: dqroks1

customer_reviews.title: it fits
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the purpose. They are pretty deep inside and just what i was hoping for. Fit all of my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper8163

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of luggage for an early Christmas gift because they were flying to Las Vegas. The loved all the storage and very attractive. Held up fine through the airport even though material isn't real real heavy. But great luggage for the price. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 4ladyz

customer_reviews.title: US Traveler 4 Piece Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and son in law to use on their honeymoon. What we like is the four pieces are large so you have plenty of room in each piece for a weekend trip, or long vacation. Pieces are made well and durable. I would recommend this luggage.
customer_reviews.author: sweetsongs

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Don' t waste your money. Once I opened the package I knew it was not going to last. I didn't have a choice but to keep it since I waited until the last minute to buy my luggage. I bought it for my trip to NY, by the time I arrived to NY airport it already had a big tear on the back. I was afraid it was not going to make it back home. It was basically a one time use.... went straight to the trash!
customer_reviews.author: VH97

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set for a lengthy trip. We have two young children and knew my husband and I would be the ones lugging our bags around. After 9 days of traveling from place to place - the luggage held up well! It was roomy as well as light weight. Great price! Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: my3boys

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Wheels broke off on the first trip. There were tears and damage to the bag. Horrible purchase. I recommend no one to purchase this item. I should have looked at all the terrible reviews it has got before making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pumba

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It looked well made enough...but after hauling it on a short trip, alot of the threading inside came undone near the zipper, and the rivets that held the top handle, (on the largest suitcase) in place fell out. I suppose for the price I should have expected as much. Though I had hoped it would last atleast one trip before it started to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: This lugage has held up very nicely. The zippers are made very well it appears
customer_reviews.text: This lugage has held up very nicely. The zippers are made very well it appears. Enjoy the extra height when I cram my clothes full I can unzipped the extra height area and then I can close it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Threads already coming loose the first time they are being used on our 31st anniversary
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after just one use!
customer_reviews.text: Good sizes and light weight, but ripped during first trip. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Very handsome bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 17-year-old son, who has travel plans. They are light-weight and very nice - perfect for both young and old. The grey enhancement on the edges makes them look very stately (and different from everyone else's black bags on the carousel). A good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Florabelle

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first trip
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for a cruise. First flight it was on, the handle broke. it would not extend out of the suitcase. I figured I would continue to use it by pulling the handle located at the top of the suitcase. That broke after two or three more trips. Would not recommend this brand due to poor quality. Looking to return it but can not find warranty information and Amazon will not take it back.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Cheap luggage
customer_reviews.text: The handles on the top broke within months on all three pieces. I only travel a few times a year so they weren't used frequently. I won't be buying US traveler anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: I Love the look of this set and I think they ...
customer_reviews.text: I Love the look of this set and I think they are constructed well "but" I don't think the telescopic handles would last more than a couple round trips. They would be excellent for road trips and light travel in my.opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Victorious

customer_reviews.title: Good price but............
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the handle on the wheeled carry on because it is hard to retract and on the large suitcase the frame was bent right away after we got it off the airplane. Not built strong enough. I guess a good price isn't always a good price if the product doesn't hold up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Cost Efficient, Travel Efficient!
customer_reviews.text: This set was under $100, and it works just as well as sets that I've owned that were twice as much. If you're looking for a dependable set of suitcases that don't cost as much as your car note, then this may be the set for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LUGGAGE
customer_reviews.text: I used this luggage on 4 trips and it still looks like new. I just gave it 5 stars and if there was a chance to give more I would. The luggage is classy looking and strong. The delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, well made, economical
customer_reviews.text: The large bag holds larger items. Convenient pockets inside, zipper pockets outside. Well made and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do like these so much i'm going to buy 2 more ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like these so much i'm going to buy 2 more sets for my children who are going off to boarding school.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it. The box was slightly damaged but everything else inside was perfect. He uses the smallest bag for his laptop and folders. He can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: poohbear44

customer_reviews.title: Best looking luggage on the belt
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, I crammed them full of stuff, and what has broken other luggage, this set took with no problem. Lugged it through four airports and two cruise terminals, with no problems. Easy to carry and roll. Loved the expanding option - gave me room for all my purchases while on vacation. Even my husband, who is very particular, noted at baggage claim how easy they were to spot, and how nice they looked compared to the rest of the luggage on the belt. Even he was thrilled with this purchase. Would do it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A bargain for the price. It held up on our latest trip real good. I like that it is expandable and the material is better than I expected for the price. We had more than enough room for 2 people on a 5 day trip.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LUGGAGE
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED THIS LUGGAGE SET AND IT ARRIVED ON TIME ,THESE WERE GREAT FOR BEING A VERY INEXPENSIVE SET WOULD RECOMMEND THE SELLER AS WELL AS THE ITEAM IF YOUR LOOKING FOR AN INEXPENSIVE LUGGAGE SET
customer_reviews.author: MIOS LOFT Tonopah,AZ

customer_reviews.title: One Piece Broke
customer_reviews.text: The roller bag - medium size broke after first use. Was not able to return as it was past the 60 days, ordered early December for Christmas gift and then did not use until after Christmas. Am currently working with the manufacturer on the warranty, this will determine number of stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Average Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I was able to score this set for a very nice price, and it has lasted me nearly a year so far of extensive travel between both coasts. The bags are not the highest quality, and are entirely cloth, plastic and cardboard (even the backing on the bags is not very high quality material). They will survive, but will rip after a few uses. Good for light travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: The cases were excellent--only one problem: the handle leather on the large case is torn and cannot get the manufacturer to honor the warrenty--still can use and did not notice the problem until after had used the other bags
customer_reviews.author: Sanzee Suthers

customer_reviews.title: They are okay....
customer_reviews.text: They have held up for a while now. The price was great for the quantity... It has really convenient sizes... It also has easy up and down handles to it.....
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Luggage has been used already for a trip to Puerto Rico, gifts for the family always puts a strain on your luggage. But I have to say they have stood up to the punishment. Next trip is in July taking a cruise, we will see how they stand up then.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this Luggage Set,I m indian so i know it is only economical set available in US with good quality & nice colors with FREE small lock with each bag Only Problem in Handle so kindly Update this Handle
customer_reviews.author: Shenkoo

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy with lots of pockets. Would like to had black color but was out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall R. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: US Traveler New Yorker 4 Piece Luggage Set Expandable
customer_reviews.text: Received in good condition in spite of the fact a corner of the shipping box was ripped open. Very flimsy box for shipping. Otherwise no problems and we are looking forward to it's use on our closely approaching cruise. We will see how it holds up and I will be back here to post again.
customer_reviews.author: price66

customer_reviews.title: Such a great set! So glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Such a great set! So glad I bought it! It's worrisome to go for something that is on the cheaper side, but this set is really great! I have no concerns about the quality. For the price, I just don't think one should pass on this set.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Rapson

customer_reviews.title: The box is a pretty big size
customer_reviews.text: This is gift so I don't know how big they are. The box is a pretty big size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent luggage, very stylish. Nicely constructed and quite lightweight before you pack it. The rollers work wonderfully! I like the way you can fit it all within the largest case for ease of storage.
customer_reviews.author: TLTrue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the Trip to India, Looks fine to me the quality and also the style but only drop was that i expected all the bags to be the same size 29inch. Still its work the price and quality. i would recommand to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Santhosh Nayak

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husbands trip to Italy and they broke on the way there in the airport. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these suitcases! They have held up very well so far and are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Davis

customer_reviews.title: very practical
customer_reviews.text: We took this set down to Venezuela and Curacao and liked them. This was actually our first matching set of luggage, because we always bought a suitcase or a duffel here and there. The zippers are all sturdy, and the fabric wears pretty well. Some of the threads on the gray fabric have pulled out, but that is just cosmetic. And all the pieces fit inside one another to store easily.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Michel

customer_reviews.title: The straps were broken on the first air trip, ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps broke on the first trip (air trip), with 50lbs in the 29" luggage and 15lbs in the 21" luggage. I didn't use the other two sizes. It's cheap but you get what you pay for. I threw them away during the trip and bought different brand.
customer_reviews.author: tenderfox

customer_reviews.title: Love how you can hook them together to roll with ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was needed. Love how you can hook them together to roll with you. Very sturdy and spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Jen-Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this luggage set for over a year now, which equates to more than 12 flights. I've also used it for car trips, so these have really gotten their use. I haven't any any problems of any kind with these and am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M.

customer_reviews.title: Well...  on the first trip
customer_reviews.text: On my first trip, non-stop JFK to Orlando, one of the zipper tags (the thing you hold onto to zip a pouch/compartment closed) is gone... I wanted to like this stuff - but, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Burkheimer

product_meta.title: U.S. Traveler New Yorker Lightweight Expandable Rolling Luggage, Black, 4-Piece Set
product_meta.description:
Functionality and innovation come together in this versatile luggage from the U.S. Traveler New Yorker luggage set. Each rolling upright features, telescopic handle system, recessed inline skate wheels and expandability. The interior has full lining, multiple pockets and tie-down straps that secure your belongings. Product Dimensions: 29 inch H x 17 inch W x 10.5 inch D (expands to 12.5 in. D) 11.8 lbs.; 25 inch H x 15 inch W x 9.5 inch D (expands to 11.5 in. D) 9 lbs.; 21 inch H x 13.5 inch W x 8 inch D (expands to 10 in. D) 7.7 lbs.; 15 inch W x 10 inch H x 7 inch D 2 lbs.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Functionality and innovation come together in this versatile luggage from the U.S. Traveler New Yorker Collection. Constructed of lightweight and durable tear-resistant fabrication, the set has multiple high capacity bodies that allow for maximum organization demanded by today's active travelers. Product Features: Crafted from durable and shinny dobby fabrication EVA foam front panel for a clean and tailored appearance Adjustable add-a-bag strap allows an additional bag to be carried effortlessly High visibility light gray interior lining and tie down straps Interior zippered mesh pocket & dual shoe pockets Expandable (25% more packing capacity) Internal retractable push-button handle system Inline skate wheels for smooth rolling Multiple front zippered pockets for travel documents and magazines Dual top and side carry handles Bottom grip makes lifting easy Upright: 29” H x 17” W x 10.5” D (expands to 12.5 in. D) Upright: 25” H x 15” W x 9.5” D (expands to 11.5 in. D) Upright: 21” H x 13.5” W x 8” D (expands to 10 in. D) Tote: 15” W x 10” H x 7” D
feature_bullets: Crafted from durable and shiny dobby fabrication, EVA foam front panel for a clean and tailored appearance
Adjustable add-a-bag strap allows an additional bag to be carried effortlessly
Internal retractable push-button handle system, Inline skate wheels for smooth rolling

Upright: 29” H x 17” W x 10.5” D (expands to 12.5 in. D) – Product weight: 11.8 lbs., Upright: 25” H x 15” W x 9.5” D (expands to 11.5 in. D) – Product weight: 9 lbs. Upright: 21” H x 13.5” W x 8” D (expands to 10 in. D) – Product weight: 7.7 lbs., Tote: 15” W x 10” H x 7” D – Product weight: 2 lbs.
